1.content: So who is our lucky target?
1.title: The journey begins

11.content:
Okay here are ideas as to how Tai becomes a girl

Story 1: During a battle Tai was hit by an attack and instead of being killed he absorbed the attack which will soon turn him into a girl

Story 2: Tai wakes up a girl and she soon enjoys it

Story 3: Tai was born a girl which both she and Kari, a few months younger than Tai, are in love with TK, a few months younger than Matt, which for the sisters become a friendly rivalry as to who gets TK first. Tai will also love both boys and girls.

Story 4: When Tai arrived for the first time in the digital world he gained the digivice for Augumon but what if Tai's partner is a black gatomon and when he touched the digivice he turned into a girl that will soon become an attractive woman that lady devilmon can help Tai out with.
11.title: Tai

115.content:
Here are two more story ideas:

Story 1: Tai finds a wish-granting artifact or Digimon and his wishes don't play out quite like he expects.

Story 2: Tai falls trough a rift and ends-up in a new reality where is gender is different (and other things, like his age/relationships/partner could be too).
115.title: More stories

choices: A strange idol (sentient digimon or spirit that grants wishes)
A shiny stone (non sentient object that grants wishes).
A different start for the story
1151.content:
It was a beautiful day in digital world. After the defeat Digimon Emperor the whole place seemed to have cleared up. The sun was shining with no cloud in sight and Tai was walking down the beach, watching his partner Agumon playing with the incoming waves.

He had come to the digital world to take his mind of his problems. The upcoming finals, his weakening performance in football, his complicated relationship with Sora, his inability to protect his little sister.... But even now his problems where everpresent on his mind. He waved back at his smiling partner, before heading towards the phone booths, where so long ago he and his friends spend their first night in this world, as something in the sand caught his eye...
1151.title: Story 1

11512.content:
A gray, smooth stone, small enough to fit inside the palm of his hand. It looked like any other stone one would find at the side of a road, the only oddity being its location, yet Tai was strangely drawn to it. He picked up the stone to get a better look. In the digi-world you never knew what being drawn to a stone might mean to you.

It felt like a normal stone. Cold to the touch, kind of rough but it seemed almost as if it was giving of a faint light. It was like one of these optical illusions, the more Tai tried to see the light, the less visible it became , but if he looked at it just right... A sudden "Did you find something interesting?" coming from behind, made him flinch and drop the stone. It was just Agumon. Having finished playing in the swallow water the digimon had come to look why his partner had walked of.

With a relieved sigh Tai bend down to pick the stone up "Maybe, look at this stone". After a few seconds of staring intently, tilting his head and making his "thinking-noise", the orange dinosaur came to the conclusion that this was in fact a rock. "What about it?" Tai was confused: "Can't you see the light?". Another few seconds of the noise before Agumon answered: "Nope, not a thing!"

"Really? Oh well I'll just show it to Izzy later.", looking at the clock of his phone, Tai's mood soured: "Speak of the devil, I have to get going." The corners of his partners mouth dropped as well as the Digimon ran behind him back towards the TV Tai had entered the world through. "Do you really have to leave already?"
"Yeah, there is a math-test tomorrow, but I come back as soon as I can." with this promise the two friends reached the half buried screen.
11512.title: A shiny stone (non sentient object that grants ...

choices: Tai turns into a young girl that doesn't have to go to school
115121.content:
The Digimon sighed: "I just wish you didn't have to leave."
Stashing the stone inside his pocket, Tai turned around and forced himself to smile. Intend on cheering his partner up before he left.
"Yeah, I wish that too."

With these fateful words the glow of the stone began to intensive until moments later the whole world seemed to be consumed in a flash of light.


So how will the fulfillment of the wish transform Tai?
115121.title: Make an accidental wish.

1151211.content:
When the light finally disappeared, Tai was gone.
In his place, was a girl who couldn't be no older than four. She many of the same features as Tai, except softer and more feminine.
Dressed in a ballet tutu, they seem out of it.
"Tai?" Agumon called out.
1151211.title: Little girl

1151212.content:
How about Tai only becomes only a slightly younger girl, but is now also a second generation DigiDestined.
She, her twin-sister Kari, TK, Davis and the other have just arrived in the to destroy more Controle Spires and since they just arrived, Tai does not have to leave.
1151212.title: Something else

11512122.content: tDoes Tai turn into a Digimon?
11512122.title: A different transformation

choices: Yes, he'll turn into a Digimon form the Agumon-line
115121221.content:
What Digimon does he turn into? A TG-component is of course wanted, but since most Digimon don't have a specified gender they are still on the table. Alternatively just make up some female Digimon.

That said maybe Tai will become a Digimon from the Agumon.line or a female variant of them?
115121221.title: Yes

1151212212.content:
Does Tai turn into one of the stereotypically "evil" Digimon?
This does not necessarily include mental changes.
1151212212.title: Another Digimon

11512122121.content: Let's get the obvious choice out of the way first: Does Tai turn into a LadyDevimon?
11512122121.title: Yes, evil him up

choices: Agumon was changed by the wish too
Agumon was unaffected by the wish
115121221211.content:
As the light faded Tai felt... wrong, as if gravity had shifted and was affecting him weirdly, as if all his limbs were the wrong size and his clothes had started a full-body hug. Dizzied by these strange sensations, his vision still swimming from the flash, Tai steadied himself and tried to rub his eyes in an attempt clear his vision, as something hit his head. Instead of the expected hand a metal bracelet had made contact with his left eye. Tai stared down at his hands in disbelieve.

Where his left arm should have ended, it instead continued on ending in a giant, wicked claw and while not a deformed monstrosity like his left, his right hand was almost worse. It was now dainty with long, elegant fingers. Not only the hand of a woman, but of a lady. It was covered in a skintight layer of black, latexy leather cloth that extended up his arm. Panic began to take over Tai's conscious mind as he took in the rest of his body

Deadly pale skin and hair, a perfect body that just oozed sexuality, clad head-to-toe in a skintight, black suit that left almost nothing to the imagination, chains, heels and two tattered wings emerging from his back. Gone was any trace of the fourteen-year-old DigiDestined, replace by a LadyDevimon

Tai's breathing became swallow as panic overwhelmed his mind. As he started to hyperventilate, a single important question managed to overpower the chaos of jumbled thoughts and debilitating panic in his head: "Was Agumon alright?".
115121221211.title: Yes

1151212212111.content: Did he turn into a different Digimon?
1151212212111.title: Agumon was changed by the wish too

11512122121111.content: Did Agumon turn into a DemiDevimon, going from partner to servant?
11512122121111.title: Yes

115121221211111.content:
Tai did his best to ignore the sensations coming from his changed body. Pushing the panic to the back of his mind he calmed himself instinctively, like he had done so many time before. After a few seconds of no longer feeling like he would pass out from hyperventilation and fear, Tai managed to look up, cringing at the feelings caused by the movement of his new body. Fortunately he didn't have to move around or even search much to find what he was looking for.

A few feet from him, at the place where Agumon had been standing when this nightmare started, a small, bat-like Digimon was lying on the ground, a Demidevimon. The first feelings that came to Tai's mind were of disgust and hate. After all, he and his friends had more then their fair share of negative experiences with DemiDevimons. These however faded quickly. While no one would call him the sharpest tool in the shed, he was by no means an idiot and it did not take a genius to put together that if he had been changed, than Agumon could have been affected as well.

There was also another problem: the Digimon Tai suspected to be his partner wasn't moving. Had Agumon fallen unconscious like he himself almost had? Or was it something serious? He had to check on him! But before the LadyDevimon could even take his first step in his new body, the Digimon on the floor began to groan and move. It struggled to its feet and looked up its yellow eyes meeting Tai's red ones. There was, understandably, confusion and fear in those eyes, but then the DemiDevimon seemed to steel itself and hesitantly asked:
115121221211111.title: Yes

choices: Tai has a panic-attack and lashes out.
1151212212111111.content:
"... Mistress?" with these words of realization the confusion faded from DemiDevimons eyes. The fear however remained as it jumped up into the air and flew towards the LadyDevimon. "I'm so incredibly sorry Mistress! I must have fallen aslee.... NO! I was knocked out by the attack! Please forgive me Mistress! I won't be so weak again!", from the panicked justifications and pleas he was spouting while circling the other Digimon, it was pretty obvious he expected some kind of punishment from his "Mistress". Said Mistress for "her" part was silent and unmoving. Not because, as DemiDevimon suspected, "she" wanted to let the bat-like Digimon hang himself with his own words, but rather because "she" was shocked speechless.

In a mere moment Tai had lost everything: His body, now a mockery of the human form, a fallen angle clad in fetish-gear. His home, he couldn't return to the human-world like this, the others would attack him on sight. And now he had lost Agumon. Tai knew that the DemiDevimon had been Agumon just a scant few minutes ago. He felt the same unspoken connection that had bound them together since they first meet. There was no doubting it, the Digimon currently flying around his head while apologizing profoundly was his partner, his best friend. The one being Tai could always trust and rely on and now it only recognized him as his current form, as a LadyDevimon and it feared him appropriately.

The panic was back. The one rock he subconsciously had held on, had been ripped away without so much as a warning. The sound of rushing blood in his ears drowned out any other sound. His vision began to swim again, as the world seemed to crumble around him. He knew he had to do something else before it all broke down.
His red eyes fell upon his partner-digimon. The Demidevimon seemed to have given up on talking his way out of this perceived failure and resigned himself to hovering a few feet infront of his "Mistress". Tai could still talk to him, figure out what happened, make sense of the madness. Everything to distract himself from the reality of his current state. Before he could even think clearly about it, the new LadyDevimon had started to speak his first words.

An murmured: "I...", was all Tai got out before he stopped in horror. The sound of his own voice was to much. Even when speaking with a neutral inflexion, his new voice was feminine. High and breathy with undertones of sexuality and violence pervading... tainting everything he said.
It was the final nail in the coffin of Tai's psyche. And it all came crashing down.
1151212212111111.title: ... Mistress?

11512122121112.content:
Did Agumon turn into a human?
Possibly a DigiDestined and the partner of LadyDevimon?
11512122121112.title: No

14.content:
Takato will be the main focus of our transformation-story, but what storyline will we be following?

(1) The Wishing-Crisis:
The classic story. Takato finds an object or some kind of Spirit/Digimon that grants his wishes, but things don't go as planned. Wishes are (maybe purposefully) misinterpreted, fulfilled in strange ways or with unintended consequences. Lots of possibilities for transformations and the exploration of their consequences.


(2) Fitting in:
After they got separated from their friends while entering the Digital World for the first time, Takato and Guilmon stumple upon a community of digimon. They are (at least superficially) friendly and helpful, offering the duo food and shelter, but things soon take a turn to the bizarre. The longer the two friends seem to stay, the more they find themselfs changing to fit into the community as if they had aways been a part of it. In the End, will they even want to leave?


(3) Waking Nightmare:
One day Takato wakes up and something has changed: maybe he is older or younger, maybe he is female or a Digimon, maybe his friends and family or the whole world have changed, or maybe its just him. The point is, only he remembers that things used to be different and now he has to find way to deal with and/or reverse the change(s).


(4) Holy Champions:
After the Digimon Soveregins witnessed the power of Biomerge Evolution firsthand in the fight against the D-Reaper, they come to the conclusion, that to protect the Digital World in the future they each will have to create and train a champion, by using one of the humens that has shown an affinity for the biomerge and some of their own essence, to act as an independend, not-entirely-digital protector. So they each seek out th human of their choice and offer them this position and of course Takato accepts, but in his transformation from human to part-digimon, he might get more than he bargained for.
14.title: Takato

15.content: How about some more options?
15.title: More options

151.content: Which of the 02-Guys will transform?
151.title: Davis/02 Guys

1511.content:
So Davis will be the main focus of our transformation-story, but what storyline will we be following?

(1) The Wishing-Crisis:
The classic story. Davis finds an object or some kind of Spirit/Digimon that grants his wishes, but things don't go as planned. Wishes are (maybe purposefully) misinterpreted or fulfilled in strange ways or with unintended consequences. Lots of possibilities for transformations and the exploration of their consequences.

(2) The Exchange-Program:
A new Digimon(?) has appeared! The mysterious entity is able to swap anything between two targets, not just physical things like body, gender or hair-color but also more abstract things like taste, habits or relationships and it seems to have taken an interest in Davis. Can the DigiDestined stop this new thread, despite the constant changes and while dealing with everything else currently threatening the digital and real worlds?
1511.title: Davis

info.brief_description: The male digidestined will soon know the fun of being a girl more than being a boy.
info.description: Anything goes but stick to having adventures with the former male digidestined transform into women
